text: Ia isar kam damu, egh yis itir bret aman markɨ. Ia 7plan aruebara yis puvatɨzir bret amɨ. Ia fo, ia fomɨra zuamɨra Isip ataghɨraghasa amua yis puvatɨzir bret ame. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia bretɨn kam amɨva, dughiar ia Isipɨn osɨmtɨzimɨn ikia an ategha izezim gɨnɨghnɨgh. Ia bizir kam zuraram a gɨnɨghnɨghvɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ ian ovever dughiam otogham.
